channel.title: Ultimate fridge prank
channel.description:
[size=20pt]Ultimate Fridge Prank[/size] [b] ITEMS NEEDED[/b]
[ul][li]Water baloon[/li][li]Water[/li][li]Sttupid drowzy friend[/li][/ul]
Step #1 First up you will need to fill up your water ballon to the full, leave some space at the end
Step #2 Simple place the water baloon in the middle shelf
Step #3 make the lip of the baloon held by the fridge doors
Step #4 If you followed correctly when he opens the fridge the water baloon will spray out water on him
Additional Options:
[ul][li]You can add some orange juice instead[/li][li]Use a hose (connect it to the fridge)[/li][/ul]
Thank you for reading

item.title: Ultimate fridge prank
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

[size=20pt]Ultimate Fridge Prank[/size]

ITEMS NEEDED

[ul][li]Water baloon[/li][li]Water[/li][li]Sttupid drowzy friend[/li][/ul]

Step #1
First up you will need to fill up your water ballon to the full, leave some space at the end

Step #2
Simple place the water baloon in the middle shelf

Step #3
make the lip of the baloon held by the fridge doors

Step #4
If you followed correctly when he opens the fridge the water baloon will spray out water on him

Additional Options:

[ul][li]You can add some orange juice instead[/li][li]Use a hose (connect it to the fridge)[/li][/ul]

Thank you for reading
